question:
Consider the following statements about the Varishtha Pension Bima Yojana 2017:
  1. The scheme will be implemented through Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC)
  2. The scheme will provide an assured pension based on a guaranteed rate of return of 8% per annum for ten years
  Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Both are correct statementsThe scheme will be implemented through Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC). The scheme will provide an assured pension based on a guaranteed rate of return of 8% per annum for ten years, with an option to opt for pension on a monthly / quarterly / half yearly and annual basis. The differential return, i.e., the difference between the return generated by LIC and the assured return of 8% per annum would be borne by Government of India as subsidy on an annual basis.
